name: ANSHITA ARYA
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute Of Technology

social_work: Volunteered to support specially-abled students at Ekta Shakti Foundation.
Contributed as a volunteer for Warriors Without a Cause.

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute Of Technology

projects.name: Employee Management System
projects.description: I created an Office Management System with user and admin logins, robust authentication, CRUD operations via a user-friendly UI, powered by a MySQL backend with XAMPP. APIs were used for efficient frontend-backend communication, and the system offers an intuitive dashboard for streamlined office administration.

experiences.description: Leading Payer and PBM platform using cloud RPA for cost-effective, quality healthcare automation. Django Development: Collaborated with the development team to work on Django-based projects for medical portals at Nirvana Health. API Integration: Gained hands-on experience in integrating APIs to enhance the functionality of the medical portals, ensuring seamless data flow. Database Management: Managed MySQL databases using XAMPP, ensuring data integrity and optimal performance. Technical Skills: Developed proficiency in Python and Django for web application development, including creating and maintaining backend functionality. Problem Solving: Contributed to troubleshooting and problem-solving efforts, helping to identify and resolve issues in a timely manner. Team Collaboration: Worked closely with the development team, fostering effective communication and teamwork to achieve project goals. Documentation: Maintained documentation of backend processes, API integrations, and database configurations for future reference. Contribution to Projects: While primarily an intern role, provided valuable support and assistance on several key projects, contributing to the team's overall success.

Created engaging content for WhatsApp, LinkedIn, Twitter, and Instagram. Managed social media presence, fostering community engagement. Enhanced brand visibility within the Web 3 community. Cultivated a vibrant online community with meaningful interactions. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align content with initiatives.

full_output.name: ANSHITA ARYA
